nodes.text: Twin Suns Two was the callsign of Jedi Knight and starfighter pilot Corran Horn within Twin Suns Squadron, when the unit was first formed during the second Battle of Borleias at the height of the Yuuzhan Vong War. During the initial stages of the siege of Borleias by Yuuzhan Vong forces under the command of Czulkang Lah, Horn flew alongside squadron commander and fellow Jedi Jaina Solo. At some point during the same campaign, Jedi Master Kyp Durron took over the position. Vale assumed the position during the raid on Ylesia. An unknown pilot took the position during the Second Battle of Bilbringi.
